No one needs to be recommended this game - you know it's good. It IS old though. If you're like me and you've somehow never played it, let me assure you, it holds up. Despite not being up to current visual standards, it's still excellent and a blast to play.

Bu oyunu Steam üzerinden henüz 84 dakika oynamış olabilir, ama bu oyunu alternatif yollarda onlarca kez bitirdim. Oyun günümüzde bile gayet oynanılabilir, özellikle MMod ile. Türkiye'de Half-Life fanatikliği çok fazla ama yine de size öneririm.

If The Original Half Life is Like A Loaf of bread Than Half Life 2 is like a cake. The Gameplay and Graphics hold up even 16 years Later And the The Narrative is incredible, The Lack of cinamatic Moments and seeing everything through the eyes of gordon Freeman is incredible, That Being Said I do like the atmosphere and lack of music from the first game to be more appealing and the game is pretty short and easy. My final Rating for this game is a 7.5/8, It has Better Gameplay Graphics and Narrative compared to the First game But the atmosphere is somewhat Lacking in comparison

Gerçekten günümüze kadar yapılmış en iyi oyunlardan biri. Half-Life evreni, karakterler, grafik, ses, tasarım, hikaye, her şey üzerine çok fazla emek verilmiş. Emek verilen şeye her zaman saygı duyarım. Bu oyuna ilaveten sevgi de duyuyorum.

Es un muy buen juego porque:
1. Buena historia y trama
2. Buenos personajes con los que te encariñas y odias
3. Buena jugabilidad
4. Gran variedad de armas para ganar batallas
5. Tienes que si o si jugar en el ambiente para llegar a otros lugares
6. Logros interesantes

Y ahi hay 6 razones de las cuales este juego es muy bueno.

Ну что тут скажешь? Игра так же хороша как и раньше. Багов нет.., наверно. Модели не смотря на свой низкий полигонаж выглядят живыми. Русский дубляж не подкачал, хотя есть некоторые погрешности. В целом, мне нравится! Как-никак легендарная игра!
A fun, scary, wild adventure. Wonderful FPS.

Half-Life 2 is an amazing game. The way it manages to tell a story without outright telling you it is amazing. The graphics still hold up pretty well today, the gameplay is immersive and grasping, and it truly makes you FEEL like Gordon Freeman.

I have no criticism for this game. Why Valve has not released the third installment yet is truly beyond me.

Прекрасная игра,можно назвать ее одним из правильных и точным воплощением антиутопии в играх,геймплея часов на 10,если проходить на все ачивки и фармить карточки не в игре,то часов 15,это просто шедевр.

How does this game hold up in 2020? Perfectly. This is a game that only gets better with age, the graphics may be a little outdated, but installing a few mods will make the game look 10 times better. This will forever be one of, if not the best FPS game of all time.
Это одно из важнейших произведений игровой индустрии. Оценки тут не нужны ведь никто не оценивает Джоконду, так и этот шедевр невозможно оценить объективно. Просто наслаждайтесь им

its good

Solo se necesitan dos palabras para describir este juego: Obra maestra. El mejor shooter que he jugado sin duda. Los graficos son buenos para ser de 2004 y la jugabilidad el muy buena. Tiene una duracion de unas 14 horas, para mi es un poco largo, prefiero de unas 9-10 horas, pero eso no le quita. La historia si bien en muchos segmentos no tiene importancia es muy buena. Si te gustan los shooters con historia, este es tu juego (y si no tambien deberias probarlo xD). Para mi es un 10/10. (Y juega al original primero, que te veo jugando a este directamente)
